name: Laruaville 12
description:
Recreate the Wild West in its former glory and build a classical Wild West Town by playing Match 3 and solving puzzles!
We bring something new into match3 gameplay with our every game and this one, as usual is full of new twists in the match 3 mechanics.
Our comprehensive hint system will help you solve any level you might be stuck and show you what to do. So don’t forget to use it!
100+ Match-3 levels available in Relaxed, Timed and Limited moves modes. And much more:
Solitaires
Blocks
Spot the difference
Hidden Object scenes
All in one game!
